Recruiters are officially cooked.

Now it’s not just what you say, how you say it, or whether you ask about salary —
apparently where your eyes go during an interview determines your IQ.

Look up and to the right?
Congrats, you’re lying.

In this video, we break down:
LinkedIn recruiters using debunked NLP body-language nonsense
Claiming they can detect lies instantly (but somehow courts can’t)
Calling job seekers “low IQ” for playing the same salary games companies play
Hustle-guru word salad disguised as “elite talent selectio
title: RECRUITERS ARE ACTUALLY COOKED!
